data.text: I was somewhat tricked into opening a Venmo credit account. All I wanted to do was pay a friend for a meal. I opened the app and was prompted to enter my address and income. Yes, I probably should have stopped and asked "why" but I was tired and thought they just wanted updated information. Turns out I opened a credit account. Support is all offshore and nearly useless. I was able the close the account but minor damage was done to my credit history because of this.

Works fine, but SUPER annoying that I can't change top friends. My top friends are all people that I've venmoed once or twice almost 4 years ago, meanwhile I have to search manually for the friends I pay twice a week every single time. Why can't I edit my top friends? Or at the very least, why doesn't it automatically update to include people that I've paid in the last month ðŸ˜­ super annoying, it's making me consider using a different app

Payments have been fine, but I've never been able to pay anyone with my venmo balance or do an automatic transfer. I can only do a bank transfer or pay from my bank. I sent in documents for identity verification specifically for these reasons, but it's been at least half a year or more since I sent them in and nothing. Supposed to be 2-3 days for a response....yeah, okay. I've sent in several submissions to customer service asking about it and no response whatsoever. Customer service is a joke.

For sending money to friends, great app. But lots of problems all the time with using the debit card attached to my account as well as funding the account. Sometimes it just won't work, no matter what. And customer service isn't open a lot of the time. When they are they make it hard as hell to reach a live person, then when you finally can all they say is sorry, they can't tell me why it's not working at this time and try again later. No solutions. So other than sending money it sucks.

Venmo apparently is owned or a part of PayPal. However, it does not function anywhere near as well as PayPal. With PayPal, it's easy to get a hold of support in the event you have a problem via chat. You can't do that with venmo, you have to call them and navigate their phone assistant and hopefully if you hit the right number you will get a hold of a human. I hate venmo.

Annoying and unpleasant. I made one payment just fine. Then on my second payment it said declined. After calling my bank, chatting with a venmo agent, logging out an in, trying multiple times the next day, and adding a new card it still won't let me make any payments. Customer service says they can't do anything about it because it's an automated system... I am extremely irritated. What a waste of time.

Login and accounting where Quicken fetches info from Venmo is very poor. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't. Quicken does not have this problem logging in to any other service that I know of ncluding various credit cards, bank accounts, etc. This is not a new problem and it has not been effectively addressed. Otherwise, the app does what it's supposed to do. I have no other complaints.

I've had this app for years and i was very satisfied up until recently when I find transactions rejected and I can't access the app, I have been on the phone and have contacted zendesk multiple times, worst problem I've ever had accessing money in a bank ever. My phone numbers the same. My email is the same. Everything is the same. I get some emails from them, but when they go to send me a one time code, it will not go to the Email that they're able to email other emails to.

I have been using Venmo for quite a while. Recently, I ran into a situation where I could not complete a transaction because the system erroneously listed my birthdate as me being 2 years old. Venmo has not been able to correct this despite a trouble ticket that has been open over a month and dozens of emails and documentation on my end. Horrible experience.

never processes the free few days. always has an issue and cannot complete. instant (that charges of coarse) ALWAYS works the first time. Coincidence? Probably not. don't claim a free transfer app when the app only allows charged transactions when using it. or fix the free transfer issue that seems to always exist. on the plus side you have an ATM in your pocket to charge you whenever you feel like paying extra money to do anything with your money.

The app is no longer functional for me. I can't top up my balance, transfer my funds, whenever I click the Me tab the app shuts down. The only thing I can do is receive money. I've uninstalled & reinstalled multiple times, cleared the cache, cleared all data - many times for both. Nothing has worked. I've tried accessing it from a browser but it just keeps wanting to open the app. If I set Chrome to desktop mode I'm able to get in , but all I can do is transfer, no top up available. Please fix.

Edit 2: Transfers don't work in the app or on the website. Says, "There was an issue with your payment". Edit: Says can login using phone #, e-mail, or username, but only logs in with an e-mail address. App is not accurately maintained. Review: Transfers are slow, but work. The main issue is that it does not remember your login info and that must be re-entered each time. Along with that, it doesn't keep your biometrics info, so that has to be re-setup each time.
data.replyText: Sorry for the trouble you are experiencing with our app. For further assistance, please email us at app-reviews@venmo.com.

data.text: The app is constantly shutting down due to bugs. Says developers need to fix it. I've unistalled. And reinstalled the app. Still no changes. I try to see the debit rewards for using the car and certain stores, and it shuts down on me immediately. It also won't all me to use the card for a gaming app. It's says something went wrong and to contact my financial institution. ðŸ˜’

Registration nightmare. If someone else has had your phone number before or worse, cloned it, you're out of luck. Even with the help of the support team, I still can't register. The only thing good about the Venmo app is the support team. They are responsive and courteous. The app? Awful, especially because I learned that your transactions are public knowledge. So much for security...

The app glitches when it asks for your fingerprint (twice) and location after opening a new instance of the app and even freezes up my phone until I fight it enough to get my phone to respond again. The pending and completed transaction screen keeps refreshing while I'm looking at the list, sending me back to the top of the list.

Just awful. The app itself, with it's UI, and all it's various settings isn't the absolute worst option out there. What's so horrifically awful about it is the service behind the app. I deposited one paycheck just fine (after paying an enormous 'same-day' fee). By attempting to deposit another paycheck, my account was marked for suspicious activity (which they did NOT tell me about). One condescending phone call and 48 business hours later, the option to deposit checks is no longer there.

Update- I used to be very happy with the venmo app up until a couple of months ago when they randomly flagged my banks debit card for instant transfers. I have been a venmo user for over 7 years and used the same debit card for transfers the whole time without having an issue. Now, all of a sudden, without any explanation or reason, my cards are being flagged. My bank hasn't found any issues, so why is venmo having one?! This app is useless to me without instant transfers! So, Cash app it is! âœŒ
data.replyText: Thank you so much for your review!

data.text: I do love Venmo, and as little as I actually use it, it always worked great, and the transactions are quick. I am more of a Ca$happ user, strictly because of the simplicity of the menus and UI. If Venmo could simplify their app a little bit, I would use it much more often. Easily deserves â˜†â˜†â˜†â˜† though, in my opinion.

It gets the job done, but I don't really care for this app's UX. It's no better than the PayPal app, but adds social features which I really find annoying in a payment app. Any banking app needs to keep my transaction history only one tap away, but no. Why can't it remember my recent payees, and offer them up when I type in the first few letters of their name?
data.replyText: You can make your payments private if you donâ€™t prefer Venmoâ€™s social aspect & you can find your friend easier by clicking their name in your personal feed or adding them as a friend. Happy to walk you through it if you reach out to us at app-reviews@venmo.com or check out: https://help.venmo.com/hc/en-us/articles/210413717-Payment-Activity-Privacy

data.text: This was once a useful app. I COULD INSTANTLY transfer money from my debit card to this app. Now, all of a sudden, I can not. I have no problem transferring money from the app to another card. But, to transfer to my venmo card is a problem. I've deleted the app. Reinstalled. I'VE EVEN CLOSED MY VENMO ACCOUNT and made a new account. PROBLEM STILL EXISTS!!! I wanted to get away from CASH APP. The AI customer service help is NOT HELPFUL AT ALL (trash). Deserves no stars

I have lots of requests to me and I cannot scroll to the middle of the list. It jumps back to the top of the list while scrolling once hitting a certain point (or after a certain time?). This means I CANNOT PAY SOME REQUESTS with the app (really its only job), I have to go to the website. Only if I scroll fast enough am I able to see my past transactions. Also, you can only see your 20 most recent requests on both app and webâ€”why devs?? I can't see in total how much I owe someone. Bad design ðŸ‘Ž

Since the latest update my Venmo won't open and keeps saying that something went wrong. I've tried shutting down my phone and app and restarting both and still receive the same message. This happens even when I've just had it open and made a transaction just minutes before. It's really frustrating!

The app is actually decent. User-friendly and easy to master within minutes. It is unfortunately still too easy to send money to the wrong person, but that is solely user-error, and can be avoided by following the recommended steps. My only genuine complaint is the service fee. It is too much to ask of each individual transaction, and should either be a flat fee per certain amounts, or a monthly membership fee instead, based on frequency of use.

Pushes credit card spam offers into the notifications even if you disable spam offers. The app exists to solicit credit card offers. If I wanted that kind of app, I would read my junk mail. You have to block all notifications to prevent being solicited credit card offers, which prevents you from seeing any important notifications, because the purpose of the app is to push credit card offers like junk mail.

App won't allow me to add funds and when I try to contact the help desk, I get an automated bot that takes me to a support page that glitches and takes me right back to the beginning. I accidentally deleted a friends request notification and can't locate it anywhere else on the app or in my email. I didn't imagine I would experience so much difficulty.

Better with the debit card! Convenient. Easy to use as long as you know who you're sending money to. Also fast. Don't like that the default screen is a list of transactions by everyone I know like a Facebook feed. I really don't care who paid what and to whim. I also don't like that my account balance isnt listed on that initial page.

Honestly one of of the easiest banking apps I've ever used. The only thing that would be an extra plus, is having a direct deposit form available or a voided check option. My currently employers still use bank forms or Voided checks which feels silly in this century but what ever. I recognize that it's a silly request. Venmo has an extremely user friendly app and everything I've used so far has made the experience awesome.

Scrolling through past transactions is glitchy. It reverts back to the top after 2 or 3 scrolls so i cant get info i need. Search option needs work too. It is very sensitive to how you spell words and most of the time doesn't pull up what you're searching for at all. (I know there's at least 25 total with one person but only 4 come up if I search) please fix!

The app is buggy as hell. I signed up and added my bank and it worked for the first couple transactions before the app randomly removed it and froze my account. I'm not sure why, I have money in my account but they didn't give a reason. I tried using the help button but it took me to a blank page and I tried contacting customer support but the messages won't send. Totally unistalling.

Horrible. Took forever to set up, only to get a message a minute later that my account was frozen "for activities that may be a violation of their rules." The help menus did not include what I wanted to ask (why I got frozen). I tried the chat bot, but found it to be infuriating. When I finally talked to a person, all they could tell me is it would take 7 to 10 days to investigate. No explanation. Got frozen twice more since but have never done any transactions.

The app and it's service are awesome , easy to use ,fast, great. But getting a hold of customer service is horrible. I ordered a debit card nearly 2 months ago, haven't received it. But I can't get ahold of customer service to replace it! So be careful. Edit: Finally found a useable email for customer service and everything is sorted out. Thank you!
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at app-reviews@venmo.com.

data.text: No issues with the app. Money transfer is easy, and fast. Love the no-fees! Only have had one complaint... My original account was frozen for no reason, and trying to get ahold of customer support was a nightmare! Took an hour just to get "The help" section to even get me to a support email address, and once I finally received the email took forever to get back to me, and yet they still had no answers. At that point, I just opened a new account, and things are good now!

Can't make multiple payments at once, can't adjust top people, and interface consistently resets or scrolls without input. Incredibly clunky UI. Fine for occasional one off payments, but struggles if you use it more consistently. Also doesn't show date a payment request was sent, only when it was paid.

Horrible user Interface. When you pay there is a layout shift that puts a new button where you were about to touch which results in unintentional behavior. Finding requests sent to you requires digging through the menu despite being the primary usage for this app. Meanwhile useless pages like cards and crypto are pushed to the main navigation.

I've been trying to sign up for this app. I got as far as creating a password and username. I was at work while doing so, and had to power off my phone several times while doing all this sign up stuff. I'm trying to sign back into the app to finish the sign up process, and it's saying my email or password is incorrect, even though it isn't. I've been trying to have an email or text sent to me so I can reset my password, but I haven't recieved anything. Not woth all the trouble.

It's bizarrely difficult to access your pending/sent notifications sometimes. The UI could be a lot more simple--just "payments you've already requested but haven't received yet", "payments people have requested of you", "transaction history", and maybe the "list of your friends' public transactions" (personally, I don't care about this and have never met anyone who does)

As a new user, I find this app cumbersome. It was not easy to set up nor fast to get verified. When sending my first funds to a friend, it kept getting denied and app wouldn't tell me why. It finally went through after lowering amount of funds only to find it that my second payment is getting denied. Overall, this app/services is horrible as it doesn't perform as advertised and/or expected. Because of that, I recommend skipping this app/service.

I would give it zero stars if able. I got a new phone, logged in, two factor authentication, and it suspended my account. It took TWO WEEKS for them to send me an email that was not only confusing but not helpful in order to unlock my account. I replied with clarification questions to which they responded with the same email. This is on top of continuous problems using the app in the time it was functional. Useless app, waste of time

Horrible user interface. I hate how I can't see my notes in the transactions so I have to open each one to see what it was. I also hate how when I have to click a transaction the list scrolls me all the way to the top instead of remembering where I was. And now there's a bug where I can't scroll down to view past transactions past payment requests.

I never rate apps or write reviews but feel obligated in this case. My account is frozen due to suspected fraudulent activity but I was simply attempting to transfer funds from my bank account to my Venmo debit card/account. Cannot access my $ at all and account has been frozen for almost an entire week with zero response to my open ticket. Not to mention it is impossible to get support via phone. Not sure how they get away with this. Extremely frustrating. Sincerely, Disgruntled Venmo User

Your apps accepted bank affiliates do not support my bank affiliate. I have had my bank for over 15 years. They have been a very dependable and accredited bank source for me. I do not want to open another bank account to use your app, or have a 3% fee to use a credit card. I am very unhappy with this! I need to pay a bill through another venmo user,and this is unacceptable to me. I do not even like having to use extra cash apps affiliated with PayPal because of too many past scam experiences!

I HATE THIS APP. My payment gets declined for no reason that I can find. I was able to send half the amount but can't send the other half? There's so artificial limit and I don't know what it is. Wasn't able to contact them. UPDATE: support reached out and said the app "Venmo is a self service app as the app run on its own" and they don't know why it chooses to decline payments when it does.

This app functions as a private data collection and tax revenue generating vehicle for the government. They claim to have certain "thresholds" of reporting; however, their own policy says they can change it at any time. The catch-all category of "goods and services" is a catch 22 because every transaction is for a good or a service. This app is trash, and I will never use it again.

Business profile is useless now. I used to be able to access my client list to request payments, but it's gone. I now have to scroll through all my transactions to find the person I need. I've sent several emails regarding this issue, and eventually you stopped responding, without giving me access to my client list. EVERYTHING ABOUT YOUR UPDATE IS AWFUL. PUT IT BACK THE WAY IT WAS!!!
data.replyText: This doesn't seem right. We want to take a closer look at this for you. Please send a note to app-reviews@venmo.com so we can connect.

data.text: Very difficult to view any past transactions!! When looking at your own personal transactions, the list only displays the amount, and not the caption/note. This is unlike any other banking app that displays the subject of each transaction. It is incredibly frustrating to go through your old transactions because you have to click into each transaction to figure out what the exchange was for if you do not remember from just the amount. PLEASE FIX

I use it because everyone else uses it, it's simple and convenient. But I REALLY wish they would disable the friend "feed" that you can see all your friend's transactions. Yes, I can set my own to "private" but there's no way to stop seeing your friend's activities --ESPECIALLY because it's the default tab when you open the app. It'll be great if they could at least let you choose the default. I seriously hate that they are trying to make this another social media.

Use a different money transfer app. I used venmo for years, many transactions, never had issues or disputes about anything. 3 months ago I was charged for an order that wasn't actually placed. I went back and forth with venmo customer service for 10 WEEKS, with a dozen different venmo people. Having to tell the same story over and over and over. And no one would ever help me, they were perfectly fine with me being charged $45 for something I didn't get. Deleting now, cashapp it is.

It's a fair app for what it's supposed to do. I only like using the desktop version these days, as the mobile version is buggy to the point where it feels unsafe to use. I've accidentally clicked options I didn't mean to due to navigation glitches while scrolling, hidden menus that pop-up last minute, etc. Think it would be a lot better with larger pay buttons, remove seller protection from every transaction, no parallax on scroll, no pop-up animations, and lock confirm payment button on press.

App constantly glitches out. Says I can't send money due to an insufficient balance while I'm staring at my bank balance, and it clearly shows I have the money im trying to send. Been like this for months, unistalled it nothing. Added another debit card and another bank account. Still won't work. This app has ONE freaking job, to send and receive money. And it can't do half of it. Can't get ahold of anyone to help. Incredibly frustrating when I have bills and people to pay.

Reset password, then enter new password and get message, wrong password. Hilarious endless loop. Never liked venmo, this don't change my mind. Try to create a new account, but oh this phone number is associated with an active account. Which of course I can't access. The thing is, there are so many other choices to do this that why bother wasting my time on this.

I can only make a payment like 1 out of 10 times. The other 90% of the time they "lost connection with my bank" which is a lie to cover for their servers failing. If I try a week later it will randomly go through. This is such an annoying app and even more annoying that they lie about "losing connection" when it's just their servers failing. I just have to try over and over again until it goes through. So frustrating.

I don't normally write reviews.. I've used Venmo for years with no issues until now. The absolute worst customer service I've experienced, account was frozen because payment was sent to a wrong account (with purchase protection). Was connected to 3 different departments for over an hour in an endless loop and wouldn't allow me to speak to a manager. Pretty sure this is by design. My wife and I are disconnecting all our bank sources and uninstalling. Great way to get customers to not use your app

So far... fingers crossed... it's been a perfect App. I now use it more regularly and love the easy that goes with sending or receiving money. 10/23 Still kinda loving this app. Noticeable changes: VERY difficult to get through to a person. When you reach a person, and they can't seem to help you, rather than transfer you, they hang up, and you start that 30+ minutes all over again to try to get thru. There have been so many Wacky things lately, I don't know if I trust this app, as much.
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: This is possibly the worst app I've ever used. For years it has been glitchy to the point where it is near unusable (can't see transaction history, app freezes/crashes constantly, has even crashed my whole phone) and it seems to be getting worse. I have stuck with it, as it is the preferred money sharing app, but after so much time with no improvement i will be switching to a different app. I have literally never reviewed an app but my hatred for this one runs so deep. wish I could rate 0 stars
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: The app frequently freezes and I have to force quit and restart, sometimes multiple times, before it works. Also, people I've sent/received money from many times (but are not friends with) don't show up when I search their name in the search bar. It is literally called "Top". However the Top search is populated with people I've never interacted with. It is very inconvenient to have to memorize everyone's handle/search my transactions for their acc.
data.replyText: Hi there - sorry to hear youâ€™re having trouble with the app freezing! Can you please reach out to us at app-reviews@venmo.com so we can take a look? Let us know if you are getting any specific error messages.

data.text: App is really buggy and setup takes forever. If your account ever gets locked, good luck! You'll need to jump through hoops and send photos of your license and bank statement. Nothing invasive or sus about that! Support response time is whenever they're feeling it. And since you need to unlock the account to close it, you'll do what it takes. Worst app I have ever dealt with, hands down.
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: Three absolutely egregious bugs in 10.29.0: 1. if I try to scan a QR from an image with biometrics lock enabled, it never ends up scanning the image. I have to disable biometrics lock first. 2. When I DO successfully scan it, there is no way to edit the message before sending the money (AFAI can tell). 3. "Send Feedback" in settings just brings up an Android "Share" app chooser populated with a little text. Venmo is NOT one of the apps you can share with! Appalling user experience.
data.replyText: Hi, we are sorry that you're having issues with the app. Can you write to us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Kindly include a description of the issue you are facing, your Android version, and your app version. We will investigate immediately & solve the issue.

data.text: Good app and services, however, it's really annoying when they have a stuck new message that asks me to verify my address. The same message always comes up even when I update my address constantly, please fix. The same also goes for adding friends, there needs to be more flexibility in adding recipients. Thank you, I will change to 5 stars if you fix these issues. Thank you for reading my feedback. ðŸ™‚
data.replyText: Hi, we are sorry that you're having issues with the app. Can you write to us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Kindly include a description of the issue you are facing, your Android version, and your app version. We will investigate immediately & solve the issue.

data.text: Very disappointing, I mainly use this app to receive money and send money for the fantasy football leagues in and manage. Buti got the dreadful "there's an issue with your payment. Try again later, " and no explanation or email that gives me an option to remedy the issue. Bank doesn't have a hold on anything. And I have no clue as to what could fix this issue. I will be limiting my use of this app going forward and will be finding other ways to receive/send money electronically.

I like using the app it's very handy but the past couple of months something has changed. when trying to scroll through transaction history it keeps sending me back to the top of the transaction history. I could be 2 or 3 weeks down the list and it will send me back to the top forcing me to scroll through again. it's not a simple glitch, it's an every time thing. it's really inconvenient when I'm looking for a previous transaction. what should take a moment to find now take 15 minutes or longer.
data.replyText: Hi, we are sorry that you're having issues with the app. Can you write to us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Kindly include a description of the issue you are facing, your Android version, and your app version. We will investigate immediately & solve the issue.

data.text: This app sucks. I've had it for a while now amd only used it a couple times. Didn't have much trouble at first. But then, all of a sudden, I recieved two separate payments for 100$ each from a friend of mine and BOOM, account frozen. With an email that didn't say anything but that it was frozen. I can't do anything. And forget about customer service. I have filled out the contact form multiple times, emailed them multiple times, and called. I was just told "Wait for an email". I am STILL waiting
data.replyText: Hi there â€” weâ€™re sorry to hear about the issues youâ€™ve been running into with your account. If you have not yet been assisted, weâ€™d be happy to walk you through whatever youâ€™re struggling with if you reach out to us at app-reviews@venmo.com.

data.text: Evil because it's defaults are to share too much info. Finding them isn't straightforward either (Friend's sharing). Also, venmo says it has two factor ID but that isn't happening for me! Googling how to set it up, venmo help doesn't correspond to the app on my phone. Can't find how to set it up. On the positive, venmo did start asking for the last 4 digits of the recipient's phone as verification of that -- a good step since I once lost money sending to the wrong person.
data.replyText: Sorry to hear that! Could you write to us at app-reviews@venmo.com with more details of your issue? We'd love to help you troubleshoot.

data.text: I use to love it! So quick & easy until now. I changed my view on this app. First off, I do NOT like when payments (sent or received) being held in a VENMO balance. People should have a choice and NOT automatically changed to it. Don't appreciate I have to go into the app to transfer a balance to my bank account or contact people I have paid to tell them to transfer my payment to their bank. Plus, your people skills are seriously lacking. That Chatbot AI is stupidly useless. Do better.
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: It is scary as hell to start paying a friend or colleague and suddenly the search results keep changing and bouncing around the screen as you go to touch the correct search result. The UI in Venmo is atrocious. Search results should not be suddenly changing multiple times after searching. Friends start at the top result and are suddenly pushed 10 entries down the list below strangers' accounts. I almost accidentally sent money to the wrong people.

The app is riddled with very frustrating and silly catch22 style bugs. These type of issues are a continuous part of using this garbage app and has been for many years. It never really improves, it just changes to new issues. A recent example was that it said I needed to verify my bank account again, I did so, but it says the bank account already existed, then I tried to remove it, but is says it can't be removed, but try again.
data.replyText: Hi, please email us a screenshot of the error you are facing along with your mobile number at app-reviews@venmo.com so we can look into this for you. We apologise for any inconvenience.

data.text: App used to work well, but now experiencing an issue. When I go to my pending transaction list, if I try to scroll down, it jumps to the top of the list. If I try to complete a transaction that is not at the top of the pending list, it won't let me and it just jumps to the top. Tried reporting the bug to support but they just blamed it on the Internet connection, which is not correct. EDIT: I already updated and do have current release, the issue persists.
data.replyText: Hi, can you please update to our latest release. Please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com if the issue persists. Thanks.

data.text: App has gone way down hill. It keeps navigating my screen to a different tab repeatedly, so I have to keep swiping to where I actually want to be. There is NO way to add money to my wallet from my bank in the mobile app, I've searched for an hour for the option, there is no "manage balance" button on my wallet tab. I guess y'all don't want my money. This app fails at accomplishing the basic function is designed to.
data.replyText: Hi, we apologize for this. Please send us your concern at app-reviews@venmo.com along with the screenshot of the error you receive. This will be handled with utmost priority.

data.text: After a month's time I still can't add money to my account. This was a good app until they broke it. Ever since the last update I can't transfer funds using my debit card or directly from my bank; even with an active Venmo debit card. Until they fix it, it just taking up space on my phone. Also the customer service is bad, it's just a bunch of cut and paste responses, no help at all.

1) I have to change the privacy for every transaction even though it says (default) next to private, it still starts each transaction as public. I have to change it to what they have listed as the default myself. 2) When I click the button to send feedback, it's linked to share & says no contacts to share with & lists the ways to share it. Im not clicking wrong one, they aren't close to each other. 3) I'm also really irritated that they charge 3% on a CC payment when my CC doesn't have a fee.
data.replyText: We understand this can be frustrating. We are working towards making this better. We would appreciate it if you could send us the details at app-reviews@venmo.com.

data.text: If I could give 0 stars I would. The list is too long. Just remember-no contact number if there is an issue! I tried for over 3 hours- all gone! Your linked bank can't help you- they can't see the transactions at all. Just looks like you paid yourself money. And super easy to create fake accounts, move money within seconds, and close that account. Look up on the Federal Trade Commission the reviews and results of these "cash moving" apps. They are not a bank!
data.replyText:
Hi,
We would like to chat with you with regards to your experience with us. Can you provide us your customer ID at app-reviews@venmo.com so that we can reach out?

data.text: Terrible experience, the whole app is geared to receiving money or paying from funds already in your account. There doesn't seem to be a way to transfer my own money from my own bank account into my Venmo account to PAY someone without using a credit or debit card that they can charge extra fees on. I verified my bank account and all personal information just fine, but any payment gets declined. Very scammy behavior!
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at app-reviews@venmo.com.

data.text: This app is really hit or miss. Randomly looses contact with your bank so you gotta set it up often. Just today I was getting money sent to me and the instant transfer just wouldn't work. Kept saying check and make sure the details were correct. I did. Multiple times. Was curious as If the same thing would happen with the 1-3 biz days and lo and behold worked instantly. Feels like they just wanted to hold on to my money for a few more days. Figure it out guys. Not cool at all.
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: Stop making banking like social media. I don't want to know what anyone else is purchasing or for them to see mine. I know you can turn that off, but it's stupid to set up an app like that. I didn't even have an account, yet someone was able to send me money, but I'm not able to access it without linking to a back account. I don't trust non-banking apps (like Chase) with my bank info!
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at app-reviews@venmo.com.

data.text: Terrible app. Won't process payments or payment methods. Glitchy. Will get phishing scams via email on it regularly. Can be hacked. Wouldn't ever save personal accounts or cards to the account. Consistently the worst money transfer app I've used. Deleted it and only got it back because a friend was in a pinch but can't even get it to work. Immediately deleting it.
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at app-reviews@venmo.com.

data.text: It was good but event having 500 in the balance it decided to say payments declined. So I couldn't send any payments at all for 24 hours and then it limits how much I can send at once or in one day. Again with the money in my venmo balance it does that. So it's frustrating to me. I have the app as well it is linked and all my information is up to date

I've just started using Venmo, but so far it has been convenient, efficient and user friendly. Security seems to be decent, as it prompted me for additional info when there was a question as to whether I was paying the correct person. I appreciated the prompt, and reviewed/adjusted the payment info, which helped me to be sure that the payment information was accurate.

For the most part I have not had an issue and Venmo works well, but customer service leaves something to be desired. Tried to pay a contractor through the app and it got declined. I confirmed with my bank there was no issue. All customer service could say is that its being declined because it is unusual for my account. They could not do anything to allow the transaction and told me to try multiple small payments to the contractor. Looking for other apps that can handle those payments.
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at app-reviews@venmo.com.

data.text: Horrible!!! I got locked out of my account for trying to transfer my money to my bank account. I absolutely do not recommend this app at all. There are far better apps than this. Once my account is unlocked, I'm getting my money and deleting my account!! If I could give zero stars I would. And I can't even talk to anyone that can resolve this issue. I've called customer service and all I got told is that everything is handled via email. I just want my money..

Used this app for a while, works well until I got a venmo credit card. The interest rates are horrible, and when you make a payment before the due date, they put an unknown hold on the payment, trying to make sure you have to pay the almost 30% interest because of the hold. When I confronted customer service about it, they said my only option was to wait a month from when the payment was pulled from my account and the hold would lift, but until then, the money was unavailable.

It's a coin toss. It's a wonky way to transfer money and the delay between parties means your money can be stuck in transit. If someone needs the cash now (worker, travel) this is not the way to get them paid. I've had some seamless transactions and the most recent transaction going on 6 days for my friend to be paid. Customer service is nonexistent and the money is "somewhere floating around in limbo." Zelle App was instant, fast transaction with no hiccups once installed.
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: It took several attempts just to add money to my venmo acct. Now I can't make a purchase with my money, error message "Payment Denied try again later" 2 days later & still can't make a purchase. The robot assistance couldn't help. They have some serious issues with their software, but they don't seem to want to fix it. I couldn't even deposit a check, error after error. This is so frustrating & embarrassing I don't see why they can't make it a usable app or get rid of it
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at app-reviews@venmo.com.

data.text: Slow, app freezes completely when you try to load transaction history with someone. If I want to see my history, I have to scroll down past pending and then it doesn't show you the message attached to them so you have to tap to open it, and then when you go back it scrolls back to the top. Update: still terrible, null profile icons instead of users initials. They fixed the return to top thing but now flick scrolling rubber-bands. App has no "load more" button on pending -> hiding some requests
data.replyText: Hi, we are sorry that you're having issues with the app. Can you write to us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Kindly include a description of the issue you are facing, your Android version, and your app version. We will investigate immediately & solve the issue.

data.text: Locked out of my account. I have only recently gotten the app and had one transaction without issues. Went to use it again and it says my account is suspended. I'll stick with a more reliable app. UPDATE: My husband recently created an account for work. After creating an account and trying to add a card his account was frozen "for violating rules". He done nothing. It refuses to let him close his account now as well. I've never seen a more confusing app that throws a fit over nothing.

This app makes so many things easier! UPDATE: I had a problem with my google wallet...including Venmo. Understandably, they froze my account until I verified my identity. But I had to ask what happened before they told me it had been froze. Then they email and say it is unfrozen. But for some reason.....I can't send or receive payments. Already checked with other banks/cards, then sent them a new request to which they answered: Sometimes this happens. Just keep trying. WHAT?!?
data.replyText: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

data.text: Fairly simple & easy to understand the way that this app is set up. The payment options for sending and receiving money between Venmo & PayPal specifically are actually very easy to understand once you figure it out the first time around. I appreciate the variety of different security features and options that are available to use however you please on your own account. So far, so good, I'm really liking this app. ðŸ‘Œ
data.replyText: Thank you for your review! If you have any suggestions on how we could improve and enhance your user experience, please don't hesitate to share them with us.

data.text: I haven't had any issues using this all in the past, but now I have a big problem with it. My roommate just sent me money via this app for rent, but every time I log in, it keeps saying, "OAuth2 Exception: Unable to complete your request. Please try again later." All my info is correct, I even successfully changed my password, but it still won't let me log in no matter how many times I reinstall the app. But now I can't even send the money back or transfer to my bank because I can't log in.
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: I had someone steal money from me over the course of several months. And it's ridiculous how difficult this app makes it's to cancel a debit, and dispute a charge. I finally had enough and put complaints in. At first they denied my claim. It was over a week but then they randomly refunded some of the money and ordered me a new card. now it's over 2 weeks, I got the new card but my account is frozen and I somehow owe them $9. I'm paying the nine and closing the account. Disappointing.
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: Worked well for a while, then all of a sudden super buggy after an update. Now my payment method won't ever populate so I can pay someone, it just says "loading" forever. I've uninstalled, reinstalled, removed my banking info, readded my banking info, restarted the phone, basically everything that can be done on my end, short of creating a new account, all to no avail.
data.replyText: Hi, can you please send us your account details along with the screenshot of the problem to app-reviews@venmo.com so that we can help you. Thank you for using our app.

data.text: I initiated a bank transfer to my Venmo balance of a sizeable amount. Less than a minute later I got 2 emails with 2 different transaction IDs for the exact same amount. Venmo had initiated 2 transfers instead of 1. As a software engineer I know how to avoid things like this and most definitely did not double tap any buttons. There weren't even any app freezes or delays in submitting the transfer. Emailing or submitting a ticket I just get a response that they will get back to me in 10 days!
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: Will not allow dispute. As soon as you click help and didn't receive it asks to log in. Obviously I'm already logged in. I put in user and password and it asks to log in. Gets in a loop with no error message. I use same password on PC but the browser version doesn't seem to have a way to dispute. So obviously Venmo can keep you from doing whatever they want because they aren't testing and dev for both web and app, which is broken.
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: This app does not work very well with the Venmo credit card account. Tried numerous times to pay my credit card bill. Added my bank twice but it wouldn't take the information. Ended up having to make the payment via phone. Very inconvenient. I do not know why you cannot look at/manage your credit card account on a website instead of a buggy app.
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: Not crazy about this app!!! Receiving payment has not been an issue however l have tried several times to transfer the $$ into my bank account with no luck whatsoever!!! I just keep getting that dreaded continuously circling symbol with no transfer completed at all! No response from the app either! Can't find a way to get in touch with Support for app either on the app!! Totally useless!
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: I really don't like Venmo. It is too hard to set up. Cashapp, Zelle are all easier. I have money in there now that I can't access simply because despite a DL & Passport it won't verify. SS card I'd have to order - Who has time for that! I use it as last resort Vendor option, though I deny it for most payments. If you are a big business, it probably fine. But to just transfer funds under $50 - it's not worth the aggravation!
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: I haven't been able to add money to my VENMO balance for the last 4 weeks. VENMO customer service has been absolutely 00000 help in resolving this issue and says there is no hold on my account, but they don't know when or if I'll be able to add money again. Worked great for several years, but not now! I'll be switching to Zelle and CashApp.

This app is dangerous garbage. It will remove the security from the app, but still sign you in automatically any time it decides to update without your permission. Almost everyone's personal banking app comes with the capability to send money instantaneously and without fees through Zelle. I charge clients extra for using PayPal and Venmo.

This should be no stars. Horrible experience, it is not correct on its transactions. Will never use again if I ever get my money. Says an exact date to be able to use the transaction but then doesn't actually let you use it. Locking me away from my funds and lying is problematic for me. It's been a whole week now. Expect big delays for transferring money, day 8 and nothing.. and told I have to wait longer now. This is a bad appðŸ‘Ž very very unpleasant experience.
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at app-reviews@venmo.com. Thank you.

data.text: Every time I want to deposit a check they freeze the transaction because they want a photo of the check with the word "VOID" written on it. There's no place to available to add said photo and it ends up costing me time and money. The customer service reps are awful, they blame shift, and are very rude. I can't think of anything I'd like to do less than dealing with Venmo.
data.replyText: Hi there â€” weâ€™re sorry to hear about the issues youâ€™ve been running into with your account. If you have not yet been assisted, weâ€™d be happy to walk you through whatever youâ€™re struggling with if you reach out to us at app-reviews@venmo.com.

data.text: This app deals with peoples money, it needs to have REAL people available to help with issues. So far I have not been able to get in touch with anyone! App was working fine until my debit card expired. Now app will not accept my new debit card. I emailed venmo but their replies are only about venmo debit cards. Contacting a real person with venmo is all but impossible! This makes me want to find another app that does the same thing as venmo but better. â˜¹

Describe my experience, well it's been terrible. They froze my account for insufficient funds. I understand taking steps for security purposes but that was my first purchase so they can't say it was an odd purchase or out of the ordinary. But they froze my account for 3 to 15 days with apparently no way to expedite that and no one I can talk to about it even though I'm 800 miles from home. As soon as I can I will be moving my money out deleting the app and I won't recommending it to anyone ever

Venmo makes it *way* too hard to remove "Top People". I had to block someone to finally get them off the Top People bar, and then Venmo updated the remaining names/profile pictures incorrectly so that one of my friends' accounts had another friend's profile. Also, the app should make it clearer which Transfer options charge fees and which don't (Instant vs '1-3 biz days'). I had to dig around online to confirm that the slower Transfer option doesn't charge a fee.
data.replyText: We understand this can be frustrating. We are working towards making this better. We would appreciate it if you could send us the details at app-reviews@venmo.com.
